snippet.title: Crikey Worm: terror plotters charged, CommBank fined, Trump-Turnbull transcript
snippet.content:
COMMONWEALTH BANK FACES RECORD FINES
Australia's largest bank is facing staggering allegations it has breached money-laundering and -terrorism--financing laws tens . In what it describes as "serious and systemic non-compliance" the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre (or AUSTRAC) alleges the Commonwealth bank failed to monitor suspicious accounts (despite several warnings from the Australian Federal Police), allowed criminal gangs to launder tens of millions of dollars through its ATMs, failed to -report tens of thousands of -transactions worth more than $10,000 (the threshold at which they must be reported) and, on six occasions, did not report customers it quickly enough.
